data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The latest slogan of my political party is awful. I ____ tell ____ they're ____ after ____ youth ____ with ____, ____ I ____ it ____ fall ____. Maybe ____ should ____ picking ____ a ____ from a comic ____. Those stories are cherished by generations of Americans, and they may hold the key to a more effective slogan.
data.partBlankContent: The latest slogan of my political party is awful. I c__ tell th__ they're go___ after t__ youth vo__ with i_, b__ I th___ it wi__ fall fl__. Maybe th__ should cons____ picking o__ a slo___ from a comic bo__. Those stories are cherished by generations of Americans, and they may hold the key to a more effective slogan.
data.answer: 我们政党的最新口号很糟糕。我可以告诉他们，他们这样做是为了争取年轻人的选票，但我认为它会失败的。也许他们应该考虑从漫画书中挑选一个口号。这些故事为几代美国人所珍视，它们可能是一个更有效的口号的关键。
